title: BRIEF-Legion Partners And 4010 Partners Call On Genesco Board To Examine Strategic Alternatives, Implement Reforms
text: February 27, 2018 / 1:24 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Legion Partners And 4010 Partners Call On Genesco Board To Examine Strategic Alternatives, Implement Reforms Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Genesco Inc: * LEGION PARTNERS AND 4010 PARTNERS CALL ON GENESCO BOARD TO EXAMINE STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES, IMPLEMENT REFORMS * ‍LEGION PARTNERS - LEGION, 4010 PARTNERS RELEASED LETTER CALLING ON BOARD OF GENESCO TO IMPLEMENT SERIES OF REFORMS, EXPLORE STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES​ * ‍LEGION PARTNERS - TOGETHER, LEGION AND 4010 OWN MORE THAN 5% OF GENESCO OUTSTANDING SHARES​ * ‍LEGION PARTNERS - GENESCO SHOULD IMMEDIATELY EXPAND STRATEGIC REVIEW TO COMPLETE “OBJECTIVE” EVALUATION OF ALL STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES​ * ‍LEGION PARTNERS - SEVERAL GENESCO UNITS SHOULD BE EVALUATED FOR SALE​ * ‍LEGION PARTNERS - GENESCO SHOULD ANNOUNCE SPECIFIC TARGETED ACTIONS, INCLUDING COMPREHENSIVE COST REDUCTION PROGRAM, CLOSURE OF UNPRODUCTIVE STORES​ * ‍LEGION PARTNERS - ROLES OF CHAIRMAN AND CEO SHOULD BE IMMEDIATELY SEPARATED AT GENESCO & REVISIONS TO INCENTIVE PROGRAMS SHOULD BE MADE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
